amendment.description: To strike the section relating to the treatment of storm water collection systems as utility systems.

action.text: Notwithstanding the passage of H.R. 2810, as amended, amendment SA 545 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Amendment SA 545 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator McCain to Amendment SA 1003.
Proposed amendment SA 545 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 545 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator McCain to Amendment SA 1003. To strike the section relating to the treatment of storm water collection systems as utility systems.
Senate amendment agreed to: Notwithstanding the passage of H.R. 2810, as amended, amendment SA 545 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 545 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator McCain to Amendment SA 1003.
